hero.headline: Boost Your Orders with AI-Optimized Food Photos.
hero.subheadline: Professionally retouched dishes that look instantly appetizing – ideal for delivery services, social media, and menus.

logos.name: Mario L.
logos.quote: Our online orders increased by 27% in the first month. The new photos look significantly more professional.

logos.name: Sarah K.
logos.quote: We used the images for UberEats and immediately got more clicks. Fast service and top quality.

logos.name: David R.
logos.quote: Unbeatable for the price. The AI optimization saves us a photographer every time.

items.title: AI Retouching
items.description: We optimize contrast, colors, presentation, and sharpness – making every dish look professionally photographed.

items.title: Background Cleanup
items.description: Cluttered backgrounds, shadows, or distracting elements are removed as needed. Important elements are added.

items.title: Unified Look
items.description: A consistent style makes your restaurant immediately more professional and trustworthy.

items.title: Social-Media Ready
items.description: Perfectly cropped for Instagram, Facebook & delivery services like UberEats, DoorDash, and Wolt.

items.title: For Restaurants
items.description: More orders, better presentation, and a professional appearance – perfect for your menu.

items.title: For Catering & Delivery Services
items.description: Optimized food photos increase the click-through rate on your dishes – and thus your revenue.

items.title: For Cafés & Bistros
items.description: Modern, bright photos for social media and digital menus.

items.question: How does it work?
items.answer: You simply send us your existing food photos. We optimize them with state-of-the-art AI and send the finished images back to you.

items.question: Do I need professional camera photos?
items.answer: No! We can significantly improve even smartphone photos.

items.question: How long does the processing take?
items.answer: Usually 24–48 hours, depending on the package size.

items.question: Can I see examples before buying?
items.answer: Yes. You get 2 free test optimizations before you decide.

items.question: What file formats do you accept?
items.answer: Almost all: JPG, PNG, HEIC, RAW.

items.question: Can I book more images later?
items.answer: Yes – you can order additional packages at any time.

ctaSection.headline: Secure AI-Optimized Food Photos Now – With Free Bonus Images.
ctaSection.subtext: Starter from €120, Standard from €200, Premium from €350.
